directions: Stir cream cheese, bacon bits, blue cheese, salad dressing, green onions, and garlic powder together in a bowl. Form mixture into 2 balls, cover each with plastic wrap, and refrigerate until chilled and firm, 3 hours or overnight.
Remove cheese balls from plastic wrap and roll in parsley.
ingredients: 1 (3 ounce) package bacon bits (such as Oscar Mayer®)
1/4 cup blue cheese salad dressing, or to taste
1/4 cup dried parsley, or as needed (optional)
title: Bacon-Bleu Cheese Ball
